title: Apply EDA tutorial patterns to all Quarto reports
Phase 5: Multivariate analysis (PCA, PLS-DA, VIP)
description: PCA time trajectory, PLS-DA early vs late timepoints, VIP scores, time-trending features, S-plot for biomarker selection.

title: Phase 1+2: Project setup, data loading & preprocessing
description: Set up project structure, install dependencies, implement data loading and preprocessing pipeline in src/preprocessing.py. Load GNPS quant tables, parse metadata, filter blanks, handle zeros, apply PQN normalization and Pareto scaling.
close_reason: Implemented preprocessing pipeline: load_gnps_quant_table, load_metadata, filter_blanks, handle_zeros, pqn_normalize, pareto_scale, build_preprocessing_pipeline. Verified 7171/6378 features loaded, pipeline produces 4370/3097 features after filtering.

title: Phase 8: Quarto report
description: Create comprehensive Quarto report with executive summary, methods, results (PCA, PK curves, multivariate, biomarkers, location comparison), discussion, and supplementary materials.

title: Create chemometrics-shared skill with reference files
close_reason: Created shared skill with SKILL.md + 6 reference files

title: Phase 3: Exploratory data analysis (EDA)
description: Dataset summary, intensity distributions, PCA quality control, outlier detection with Hotelling T2.

title: Add extract_splot_biomarkers function
description: Add function to extract biomarker candidates from S-plot based on covariance and correlation thresholds

title: Update multivariate tutorial with plotly plots and biomarker tables
description: Replace matplotlib plots with plotly versions, add biomarker extraction and tables after S-plots
close_reason: Updated multivariate tutorial with plotly plots and biomarker tables

title: Phase 7: Location comparison (forearm vs forehead)
description: Feature overlap analysis, diphenhydramine detection rate comparison, model performance comparison between locations, generate recommendation.

close_reason: Added all 6 plotly plotting functions to src/multivariate.py

title: Quarto report deduplication with shared config
close_reason: Reverted - out of scope, only skills and CLAUDE.md

title: Phase 4: Diphenhydramine detection and PK analysis
close_reason: Implemented drug_detection.py module and drug_detection_tutorial.qmd report. All 8 functions, 3 target compounds, full PK pipeline verified.

title: Phase 4: Diphenhydramine detection & PK curves
description: Search for diphenhydramine and metabolites by m/z (10 ppm tolerance), extract PK curves, calculate Cmax/Tmax/AUC, compare plasma vs skin.

title: Metabolomics analysis: Diphenhydramine pharmacokinetics in plasma vs skin
Refactor 4 chemometrics skills to thin routing layers
close_reason: All 4 skills refactored to thin routing layers with reference files

title: Implement Phase 5: Multivariate Analysis
description: Implement src/multivariate.py with: PCA time trajectories, PLS-DA (early vs late timepoints), VIP scores, time-trending features (Spearman), S-plot for biomarker selection. Follows Phase 5 of the metabolomics analysis plan.
close_reason: Implemented src/multivariate.py with all Phase 5 functions: PCA trajectories, PLS-DA, VIP scores, S-plot, time-trending features, permutation test. All 17 tests pass.

title: Add tests for new multivariate functions
description: Add test coverage for extract_splot_biomarkers and all plotly plotting functions
close_reason: Added comprehensive tests for extract_splot_biomarkers and all plotly functions

title: Phase 6: Proxy biomarker discovery
description: Correlate skin features to plasma diphenhydramine, select candidates (VIP>1, FDR p<0.05), build PLS regression to predict plasma drug from skin metabolites, evaluate with LOSO-CV.
